channel.title: v1.16 on XXL Steve
channel.description: Recent content in v1.16 on XXL Steve

item.title: No More Scary Cave Sounds
item.description: No More Scary Cave Sounds is a resource pack that will change the cave sounds (yes, they got added in 1.16!) “ambient.cave” to “ambient” sounds like water lowing in a cave or birds singing. This resource pack will change the ambient.cave sounds to less terrifying sounds (I hope so!). The cave sounds also play in superflat worlds & servers even though you’re not in a cave so that could make your gameplay more “ambient”.

item.title: A Little Simple Spleef Game
item.description: Just a little, simple Spleef game. This map contains 2 arenas; the first with 2 layers and the second with 3 layers, and 2 gamemodes (Classic Spleef & Snowball Spleef). How to Play: Your goal is to break the block under the other players to make them fall. At the final layer they will fall to the void and die! Last player alive wins. Gamemodes: Classic Spleef: Normal Spleef. Snowball Spleef: In this gamemode you will have 1 snowball for every block you break.
